entry.title: 2 in 1 (Type C) Home Adapter & USB Data Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 5.50

  • Combo: Home Adapter & Type C USB Data Cable
  • Protection: Over-current, Short-circuit, and Over-temperature protect your device.
  • Smart Charge: Auto Detects the connected device and charges it at the fastest speed of the device.
  • EXCLUSIVE TECHNOLOGY: Exclusive quick charge technology automatically detects and delivers the optimal charging current for any connected device - ensuring the quick and most efficient charge.
  • Fire-resistant and hardened plastic outer shell for durability, built-in premium circuitry, and microchip ensure device safety.
  • Good Charging Speeds Most Powerful - Charge any USB powered devices at top speed continuous.
  • Please note: This is an aftermarket accessory. All trademarks on this website are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: 2 in 1 (Micro) Home Adapter & USB Data Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 4.45

  • Combo: Home Adapter & Micro USB Data Cable
  • Adaptive Fast Charging Technology & Slim and Compact Design, Over Current and Over Voltage Protection
  • Smart Charge: Auto Detects the connected device and charges it at the fastest speed of the device.
  • Multiple Protections: Over-current, Short-circuit, and Over-temperature protect your device, Auto Cut: On Over Heat
  • COMPATIBLE WITH: Android and Windows phones, tablets and many other Micro USB devices including Samsung, Nokia, Whiteberry, LG, Micromax, Motorola / Moto, Microsoft, Sony, HTC, Huawei, Lenovo, Xiaomi, Acer, Asus, Oppo, Meizu, Alcatel, Zte, Toshiba, Vodafone, GigaByte, Pantech, Xolo, Lava, Intex, YU, Spice, Blu, Gionee, Vivo, Verykool, Maxwest, Niu, Yezz, Parla, Plum, LeEco, InFocus & All Mobiles, Tablets.
  • Please note: This is an aftermarket accessory. All trademarks on this website are the property of their respective owners.

entry.title: 2 in 1 (Lightning) Car Adapter & USB Data Cable - iPhone 5/6/7/8/X (Dual USB)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Charging Cables
Price: 4.99

  • Combo: Car Adapter (Dual USB) & Lightning (iPhone) USB Data Cable
  • Car Charging Adapter with Cable 
  • Ideal For: Cars | Mobiles
  • Current: 2.4 Amps
  • Faster Sync and Charging

  • Built for Convenience

    Charge your Apple devices with this 2 in 1 Car Charger and Lightning Cable which efficiently charges all Apple devices and due to its high output, smartphones tend to charge faster and at a constant electric input.

    Suitable with the electric system of the cars, you can conveniently charge your devices via a cigarette lighter socket. 

  • Please note: This is an aftermarket accessory. All trademarks on this website are the property of their respective owners.
